name: Bangladesh
tagline: Geospatial Livelihoods Analysis for Bangladesh Mission
body:
### Welcome to the Bangladesh Geospatial Livelihoods Analysis page.
This project is a work in progress and will focus on analyzing the spatial dimensions of livelihoods in rural Bangladesh. 

```
Stata code and R code to follow shortly.
```

### Authors and Contributors
The main point of contact for the project is Tim Essam [tessam[at]usaid.gov].
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
